name: Bones for the Bone God LD43
name_original: Bones for the Bone God LD43
description:
Cool skeleton game

LMB/Ctrl - hold to move blocks

Click on skeleton to stop/unstop them in place

Q/RMB - unstop all skeletons

E - sacrifice skeleton (works near weird entrance-looking thing)

WSAD

R - restart

ESC - exit to menu
